title: The Last Night I Cry for You
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

Tonight’s the last time I’ll think of you,
I’ll close the door to the love I once knew.
I’ll hear the echo telling me to let go,
In the arms of forgetting, my heart will grow.

You’ll never see my tears fall again,
I won’t call your name in the night’s refrain.
I’ll leave it all behind—your memories, your voice,
Tonight, my heart will be my choice.

This is the last night I cry for you,
The final time I beg for truth.
I swear tomorrow will shine brighter for me,
And though you’ll never forget, I’ll be free.

I believed in the spark of your eyes, your vow,
A love eternal, but it’s over now.
Shattered dreams after nights of desire,
All that’s left is the shadow of a once-bright fire.

This is the last night I cry for you,
The final time I beg for truth.
I swear tomorrow will shine brighter for me,
And though you’ll never forget, I’ll be free.

Your memory will fade, like wind through the sea,
I’ll move forward, unchained and free.
The love I thought we had was only illusion,
Now all that’s left is this final conclusion.

title: I Won’t Stop You!
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

We made a pact, you and me,
to set each other free.
When the love fades, don’t look back,
no chains, no strings, no track.

Your eyes now speak what words won’t say,
the end is here, you’ve made your way.
I promised I’d let go of you,
though my soul splits in two.

I won’t stop you!
No, I won’t stop you!
We made a pact, no chains, no ties,
even if my world dies.
I won’t stop you!
No, I won’t stop you!

The promises we made are carved in stone,
but time erodes, and love's dethroned.
I see your shadow fading fast,
a love that wasn’t meant to last.

My fists are clenched, but I won’t fight,
your freedom burns my endless night.
Though my heart screams, I’ll let you go,
a pact of love I’ll never outgrow.

I won’t stop you!
No, I won’t stop you!
We made a pact, no chains, no ties,
even if my world dies.
I won’t stop you!
No, I won’t stop you!

Your steps echo in my mind,
your shadow fades, love left behind.
Freedom hurts, but love’s no cage,
I let you go, though I’m enraged.

I won’t stop you!
No, I won’t stop you!
We made a pact, no chains, no ties,
even if my soul cries.
I won’t stop you!
No, I won’t stop you!

title: The Last Goodbye
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

[Verse 1]
It feels strange to have you so near,
Knowing today’s the last time you’ll be here.
We won’t meet again, that’s clear,
I want to say so much,
But I can’t… I just can’t.

So much love we gave away,
What happened? Why did it fade?
We’re no longer who we used to be,
Here together, just to say goodbye.

[Pre-Chorus]
It slips away, slips away, what we used to know,
It slips away, and with it, love’s last glow.
There’s no reason left to try,
It hurts, it hurts, to say goodbye.
A lump in my throat, tears in my eyes,
Everything we were now slowly dies.

[Chorus]
And it hurts, hurts more than I thought it would,
Watching love leave, without a reason it should.
We’re standing here with nothing to say,
Questions lingering, as love drifts away.

[Verse 2]
Every kiss feels distant and cold,
The warmth we had is now old.
Promises turned into lies,
Forever slipped away from our eyes.

What’s left is a bitter taste,
Knowing we failed, what a waste.
Starting over fills me with fear,
But staying would only keep us here.

[Pre-Chorus]
It slips away, slips away, what we used to know,
It slips away, and with it, love’s last glow.
There’s no reason left to try,
It hurts, it hurts, to say goodbye.
A lump in my throat, tears in my eyes,
Everything we were now slowly dies.

[Chorus]
And it hurts, hurts more than I thought it would,
Watching love leave, without a reason it should.
We’re standing here with nothing to say,
Questions lingering, as love drifts away.

[Bridge]
Why, why did we stop trying?
Why, why did love start dying?
A lump in my throat, tears in my eyes,
Because deep inside, I still can’t say goodbye.

[Final Chorus]
And it hurts, hurts more than I thought it would,
Watching love leave, without a reason it should.
We’re standing here with nothing to say,
Questions lingering, as love drifts away.

[Outro]
(Soft piano fading out, accompanied by gentle strings)
It’s over now, though I wish we’d fight,
There’s nothing left for us to make it right.

title: Dolor En Silencio
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

¡Haaay  Amor...!

Me pediste partir, y yo solo asentí,
aunque mi pecho ardía, te dejé decidir.
El silencio será mi fiel compañero,
y en cada copa escondo lo que siento entero.

Te miré alejarte con paso sereno,
guardé mis lágrimas para otro terreno.
No quiero que cargues con mi sufrimiento,
prefiero callarlo y dejar que te lleve el viento.

Vete tranquila, no voy a detenerte,
te dejo mi sonrisa aunque me cueste la muerte.
El tequila será mi único testigo,
de este dolor que cargo y nunca te digo.
Vete tranquila, no quiero verte llorar,
aunque me muera por dentro, te dejo volar.

En cada sorbo te digo adiós en silencio,
mi corazón se quiebra, pero sigo recio.
No quiero que veas mi herida sangrar,
mi amor es dejarte, no intentar cambiar.

El licor me abraza, mi refugio fiel,
me ayuda a ocultar lo que no quiero ver.
Si el amor se mide por cuánto se sufre,
entonces este adiós será eterno y dulce.

Vete tranquila, no voy a detenerte,
te dejo mi sonrisa aunque me cueste la muerte.
El tequila será mi único testigo,
de este dolor que cargo y nunca te digo.
Vete tranquila, no quiero verte llorar,
aunque me muera por dentro, te dejo volar.

Vete tranquila, no voy a detenerte,
te dejo mi sonrisa aunque me cueste la muerte.
El tequila será mi único testigo,
de este dolor que cargo y nunca te digo.

Vete tranquila, no voy a detenerte,
te dejo mi sonrisa aunque me cueste la muerte.
El tequila será mi único testigo,
de este dolor que cargo y nunca te digo.

title: Otra Navidad Sin Ti
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

Ha pasado un año desde que te fuiste,
y aunque lo intento, no logro, Olvidarte.
Cada rincón, cada aroma, cada instante,
me devuelven tus caricias tan distantes.

Hoy me arrepiento de haberte dejado ir,
no supe valorar lo que eras para mí.
Es diciembre otra vez, otra navidad sin ti,
y aquí estoy, ahogándome en mi sufrir.

Otra navidad sin ti, sin tu voz, sin tu risa,
entre luces y brindis, mi alma está hecha trizas.
Mis amigos me dicen "¡Sonríe, vive ya!",
pero cómo festejo si mi vida no está.

Otra navidad sin ti, solo el viento responde,
¿dónde estarás, amor? Mientras el frío se esconde.
Desde aquí, donde lloro, te deseo lo mejor,
pero muero despacio, con este corazón.

Debí mirar más tus ojos, poner atención,
a esos detalles que gritaban amor.
Ahora el tiempo se me va como el agua,
y en mi pecho solo queda esta batalla.

Las calles brillan, se escucha un villancico,
la gente abraza, yo solo maldigo mi destino.
¿Cómo olvidar aquel diciembre junto a ti?
Eras mi todo, y hoy no sé si sobreviví.

Otra navidad sin ti, sin tu voz, sin tu risa,
y aunque brinden por la vida, mi alma agoniza.
Te deseo, amor mío, un diciembre de paz,
mientras yo, en silencio, te vuelvo a recordar.

Otra navidad sin ti…
y yo aquí… muriendo por ti.

title: Set Me Free
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

Aaaahhhhh

The walls are closing in, I can barely breathe,
your voices echo loud, like chains gripping me.
Every step I take feels like I’m being judged,
but I’m not the one who’s never messed up.

You want me to follow the lines you’ve drawn,
but this life isn’t mine; it’s already gone.
I can’t be the image that you need to see,
I just want to live, to finally be me.

“Let me fall, let me break, let me rise from my mistakes.”
I can’t carry the weight of your dreams anymore.

Set me free, let me take the risk,
this life is mine to live, no matter what it is.
I know you want the best, but don’t you see,
the best for me is to be free.

Your words cut deep, but they’ve numbed my heart,
you tell me who to be, but I’m torn apart.
Do you see the cracks behind my smile?
I’ve been breaking for a long, long while.

I know you think you’re keeping me safe,
but I’m drowning in the choices you make.
If I fail, I’ll learn, and if I fall, I’ll fight,
but I can’t keep living your perfect life.

“Let me fall, let me break, let me rise from my mistakes.”
Your love feels like a cage, but I need the door.

Set me free, let me take the risk,
this life is mine to live, no matter what it is.
I know you want the best, but don’t you see,
the best for me is to be free.

“Don’t you love me enough to let me go?
Can’t you trust that I’ll find my own road?”
I hear your fear, but I can’t stay,
this isn’t my life, it’s slipping away.

title: Donde el Tiempo No Existe
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

[Verso 1]
El viento susurra lo que no puedo decir,
Tus huellas se desvanecen, no sé cómo seguir.
El silencio ahora ocupa tu lugar,
Pero en mi corazón, aún puedo escuchar.

[Pre-Coro]
Cada estrella parece llevar tu voz,
En cada sombra, siento tu calor.
Aunque la distancia nos haya roto en dos,
Sé que en algún lugar estarás tú y yo.

[Coro]
Porque un amor tan grande no puede terminar,
Ni el tiempo, ni la muerte lo podrán borrar.
Te buscaré donde el cielo se encuentre con el mar,
Y ahí, en ese rincón, nos volveremos a abrazar.

[Verso 2]
No fue un adiós, solo un hasta luego,
Dos almas que el destino ha vuelto un juego.
Cierro los ojos y puedo sentir,
Que aún me esperas, en algún lugar sin fin.

[Pre-Coro]
Cada latido lleva tu nombre, amor,
Eres la razón detrás de cada color.
Aunque ahora la ausencia sea mi realidad,
Sé que volveremos, más allá de la eternidad.

[Coro]
Porque un amor tan grande no puede terminar,
Ni el tiempo, ni la muerte lo podrán borrar.
Te buscaré donde el cielo se encuentre con el mar,
Y ahí, en ese rincón, nos volveremos a abrazar.

[Puente]
En cada sueño, veo tu mirar,
Un reflejo que nunca se va a apagar.
Quizás el destino nos volvió a separar,
Pero este amor es eterno, no va a descansar.

[Coro Final]
Porque un amor tan grande no puede terminar,
Ni el tiempo, ni la muerte lo podrán borrar.
Te buscaré donde el cielo se encuentre con el mar,
Y ahí, en ese rincón, nos volveremos a abrazar.

[Outro]
Hasta ese día, seguiré viviendo,
Con tu recuerdo, mi alma va latiendo.
En cada paso que dé, en cada amanecer,
Sabré que tú también me vas a esperar.

title: El Último Adiós
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

[Verso 1:]
Es extraño tenerte tan cerca,
Sabiendo que hoy es la última vez.
Ya no volveremos a vernos otra vez,
Quiero decirte tantas cosas,
Pero no puedo... no puedo.

Tanto amor que nos dimos,
¿Qué pasó? ¿Por qué murió?
Ya no somos lo que solíamos ser,
Estamos aquí juntos, pero para decir adiós.

[Pre-Coro:]
Se va, se va, lo que fuimos tú y yo,
Se va, se va, y con él nuestro amor.
No hay razón que pueda explicar,
Solo duele, duele, dejarte atrás.
Un nudo en la garganta, ganas de llorar,
Todo lo que fuimos se empieza a borrar.

[Coro:]
Y duele, duele más de lo que pensé,
Ver cómo el amor se va sin un porqué.
Nos quedamos en medio de la nada,
Con mil preguntas y ninguna palabra.

[Verso 2:]
Cada beso se siente vacío y distante,
El cariño es frío, ya no es como antes.
Las promesas se volvieron mentiras,
Y el “para siempre” dejó de ser vida.

Ahora queda solo este sabor amargo,
De saber que fallamos y cargar con el cargo.
El miedo a empezar de nuevo me hace temblar,
Pero seguir así ya no tiene lugar.

[Pre-Coro:]
Se va, se va, lo que fuimos tú y yo,
Se va, se va, y con él nuestro amor.
No hay razón que pueda explicar,
Solo duele, duele, dejarte atrás.
Un nudo en la garganta, ganas de llorar,
Todo lo que fuimos se empieza a borrar.

[Coro:]
Y duele, duele más de lo que pensé,
Ver cómo el amor se va sin un porqué.
Nos quedamos en medio de la nada,
Con mil preguntas y ninguna palabra.

[Puente:]
¿Por qué, por qué dejamos de intentar?
¿Por qué, por qué dejamos de amar?
Un nudo en la garganta, ganas de llorar,
Porque en el fondo no puedo dejarte de amar.

[Coro Final:]
Y duele, duele más de lo que pensé,
Ver cómo el amor se va sin un porqué.
Nos quedamos en medio de la nada,
Con mil preguntas y ninguna palabra.

[Outro:]
(Instrumental suave con piano y cuerdas, desvaneciéndose lentamente)
Se terminó, y aunque quiera luchar,
Ya no queda nada que podamos salvar.

title: Through the Glass
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

haaa aa aaa  aa ummm um

Through the glass, beneath the falling rain,
I see you fading, your shadow in pain.
Time stands still as the cold sets in,
your figure dissolves, taking all within.

I want to run, but fear holds me tight,
my words are lost in the dead of night.
A whisper escapes in the echo of goodbye,
and I’m lost in the mist where memories lie.

Through the glass, I still trace your face,
the rain erases your steps, but not your place.
You take my laughter, my warmth, my hope,
and here I remain, watching you go.

Streetlights flicker on the empty lane,
your silhouette dissolves in the pouring rain.
My hand on the window reaches for you,
but only meets the void where you once drew.

I want to scream, but my chest stays numb,
tears fall like rivers as the silence hums.
The reflection shows what’s left of me,
a shattered soul that longs to be free.

Through the glass, I still trace your face,
the rain erases your steps, but not your place.
You take my laughter, my warmth, my hope,
and here I remain, watching you go.

ooouuu  uuuuu uuuu uuuu uu

Every drop that falls is a heartbeat missed,
every step you take steals what I resist.
Though the glass stands between us, you see,
my heart breaks through, searching for thee.

Through the glass, I still trace your face,
the storm roars loudly, but not my embrace.
You take my laughter, my warmth, my hope,
and here I remain, praying you’ll return,
praying you’ll return

ooouuu uuu

title: December Snow
prompt: christmas orchestra duet male and female voice
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

Ummm haaaaa

I saw you leave beneath the snowfall,
your shadow fading into the gray.
Your voice once filled our home with laughter,
but now the silence holds its sway.

The roads we walked now feel much colder,
the memories cut just like the frost.
The winter stole our Christmas magic,
and left me mourning what we lost.

December snow, you fall so cold,
like the emptiness you left in me.
December snow, you hide the footsteps,
but you can’t erase what used to be.

I still recall the Christmas mornings,
your smile beneath the twinkling lights.
The tree would glow, the room felt endless,
but now it’s fading into the night.

The silence fills the empty spaces,
your side will never feel the same.
And though I try to light a candle,
its flicker whispers through the pain.

December snow, you fall so cold,
like the emptiness you left in me.
December snow, you hide the footsteps,
but you can’t erase what used to be.

If I could turn back all the seasons,
if I could rewrite this bitter end,
I’d hold you close on Christmas Eve,
and never let you go again.

December snow, you hide my tears,
but you can’t heal this aching soul.
December snow, you’re a witness,
to the love the winter stole.

When the carols no longer echo,
and the lights fade on this empty tree,
I’ll search for you in every flake,
where you’ll always live in me.

title: Where Time Stands Still
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

[Verse 1]
I’ve searched the winds
For the words you left behind,
The moon keeps me company,
While I wait with you in mind.

Every night reflects
What we used to be,
I wonder if in your dreams
You still think of me.

[Chorus]
I can’t forget what we were,
In dreams and memories, you remain.
Even if time pulls us far apart,
Your light will shine through every pain.

[Verse 2]
The sky holds your footprints,
Fading with the dawn,
The silence fills the spaces
Where your voice once shone.

Though fate has drawn us away,
You’re still within my soul,
A love like ours never fades,
It remains forever whole.

[Chorus]
I can’t forget what we were,
In dreams and memories, you remain.
Even if time pulls us far apart,
Your light will shine through every pain.

[Bridge]
Every star whispers your story,
Every step leads me back to you.
Between shadows and old memories,
I know I’ll find you shining through.

[Final Chorus]
I can’t forget what we were,
In dreams and memories, you remain.
Even if time pulls us far apart,
Your light will shine through every pain.

[Outro]
And though time moves on,
I’ll keep searching through it all.
In dreams and memories,
I'll love you through it all.

title: Despedida Amarga
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

[Verso 1]
Te juro que te amo,
La noche se vuelve fría,
Por dentro estoy temblando,
Mientras tu sombra se aleja.

[Pre-Coro]
Pronto partirás,
Un tren te llevará,
En la oscuridad densa,
Mi alma se quebrará.

[Coro]
El tiempo avanza,
Te juro que mi amor queda,
Ahora estás llorando,
¿De qué sirve la tristeza?

[Verso 2]
Si alguna vez regresas,
Tu memoria revivirás,
Nuestros momentos perdidos,
Siempre en mí estarán.

[Puente]
Mi sentimiento es firme,
En el dolor y el pesar,
Aunque la noche sea larga,
Mi corazón es tu lugar.

[Coro]
El tiempo avanza,
Te juro que mi amor queda,
Ahora estás llorando,
¿De qué sirve la tristeza?

[Coro Final]
En esta despedida amarga,
Tu sombra permanecerá,
Aunque la noche sea larga,
Mi corazón es tu lugar.

[Fin]
En esta despedida amarga,
Tu sombra permanecerá,

title: Siempre Contigo
lyrics:
© 2024 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════
Dedicación especial
"De un padre para su hija, con todo el amor del mundo."
En especial, para ti, "Teresita de Jesús."
Que esta canción sea un abrazo eterno que trascienda el tiempo y la distancia.
Para todas las hijas y padres que comparten un amor único e incondicional.
¡Disfrútenla!
═════════════════

Cuando llegue el día en que deba partir,
cuando el tiempo decida que ya no puedo seguir,
quiero que sepas, mi pequeña, mi amor,
que aunque no me veas, estoy en tu corazón.

En cada amanecer, en cada rayo de sol,
en el viento que juega, ahí estaré yo.
Cuando rías, cuando llores, en tu caminar,
mi espíritu estará contigo, te voy a cuidar.

Siempre contigo, en cada latido,
en tus pasos, en tus sueños, soy tu abrigo.
Si hay un lugar más allá, te juro, estaré,
viéndote crecer, amándote como la primera vez.

Habrá días oscuros, momentos de dolor,
pero recuerda, mi niña, eres mi mayor honor.
Llena el mundo de luz, con tu risa y tu andar,
lleva en alto mi amor, nunca dejes de brillar.

Cuando alcances tus metas, cuando falles también,
sabrás que siempre creí en lo que puedes ser.
Mi orgullo eterno, mi razón de vivir,
aunque parta, contigo voy a seguir.

Siempre contigo, en cada latido,
en tus pasos, en tus sueños, soy tu abrigo.
Si hay un lugar más allá, te juro, estaré,
viéndote crecer, amándote como la primera vez.

Si cierras los ojos y escuchas con fe,
en el susurro del viento, con mi voz te hablaré.
“Estoy aquí, mi amor, nunca te voy a dejar,
mi alma está contigo, en cada lugar.”

Cuando mi estrella brille en el cielo azul,
será mi manera de decirte: “Aquí estoy ”
Aunque parta, mi amor no tendrá fin,
porque en ti, mi hija, siempre voy a vivir.

title: あなたへの愛はずっと変わらない
lyrics:
[Verse]
君の笑顔が太陽みたいに
俺の心を温めるんだ
どんな時も君のそばで
星のように輝きたいんだ

[Verse 2]
君と一緒の瞬間が
毎日を宝石に変えるんだ
雨が降っても風が吹いても
俺の愛は決して揺らがない

[Chorus]
あなたへの愛はずっと変わらない
どんな未来も共に行こう
手を握って一緒に歌おう
君だけが俺のすべて

[Bridge]
高い山も深い海も
越えて行ける気がするんだ
二人なら何も怖くない
夢の中でも君といたい

[Verse 3]
忘れられない思い出たち
一つ一つが宝物さ
新しい日々を塗り替えて
未来を一緒に描こう

[Chorus]
あなたへの愛はずっと変わらない
どんな未来も共に行こう
手を握って一緒に歌おう
君だけが俺のすべて

title: Thank You Life
lyrics:
© 2025 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

Thank you, life, for every sunrise I see,
for the fresh air and the vast, endless sea.
For the steady steps that made me fall down,
and for those that lifted me from the ground.

It's a gift to be here, to feel, love, and laugh,
even when the road gets rough along the path.

Thank you for the days and the light of the sun,
for the rain that heals when the day is done.
Thank you for the time that won’t return,
for every moment, and the lessons learned.

Thank you for the faces that crossed my way,
for the smiles and tears that chose to stay.
For the gentle voices that brought me peace,
and for the silence teaching patience and release.

It’s a miracle to breathe, to dream, to give,
so I sing to the world: it’s a gift to live!

Thank you for the days and the light of the sun,
for the rain that heals when the day is done.
Thank you for the time that won’t return,
for every moment, and the lessons learned.

And though storms may sometimes darken the skies,
a rainbow always finds its way to rise.

Thank you for the days and the light of the sun,
for the laughter that breaks through when the pain is gone.
Thank you for the time that lies ahead,
for this moment now, and the life I’ve led.

Thank you, life, for all that I’ve become,
for what I was, and what I will become.

title: Gone with the Wind
lyrics:
© 2025 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════

You arrived without warning, like a ray of sun,
you lit up my world, your voice was the one.
I, who didn’t believe in love’s sweet song,
fell into your gaze, where I felt I belonged.

But time moved on, and something changed,
your empty words, the love estranged.
You said, "I need space, it’s not the end,"
but today I know the truth: I wasn’t your only friend.

And it hurts, it hurts, more than I thought it would,
because when I loved you most, you left for good.
Your promises, your promises, were taken by the wind,
and now I’m left here, with this emptiness within.

I saw you today with someone new, and the world stood still,
I remembered your promises, the dreams we used to build.
I don’t know if you were honest, I don’t know what was real,
all I know is this pain is all that’s left to feel.

And though it hurts to admit you weren’t true,
I hold no grudge, I’m done with the blues.
I just hope you’re happy, I hope you find your peace,
even if the cost was my heart, and its ache won’t cease.

And it hurts, it hurts, more than I thought it would,
because when I loved you most, you left for good.
Your promises, your promises, were taken by the wind,
and now I’m left here, with this emptiness within.

But time will heal, I know it’s true,
and though I don’t have you, I’ll find myself anew.
I wish you the best, even if you’re not here,
because the love we once had was also mine to bear.

title: Daddy’s Gift
lyrics:
© 2025 - Mr. Villain (MRMS)
═════════════════
[This song is inspired by the deeply moving story of John Reid and his son, Dakota. After Dakota’s passing, John had the chance to hear his son’s heartbeat once again, donated to save another life. The song pays tribute to sacrifice, unconditional love, and the eternal legacy of such a profound act of generosity. Through its lyrics, it conveys the power of a gift that transcends life itself, filling listeners with hope and emotion. I can’t promise you won’t shed a tear, as I did while writing this song.]
═════════════════

Ummmm Ummmm

I felt so bad I could feel the end,
My laughter faded, I couldn't pretend.
I watched the doctors talk to dad,
Their faces heavy, their news so sad.

He sat down beside me and took my hand,
He whispered, “Everything will be okay, my love.
Don't worry, trust me,
I'll find a way, just wait and see.”

Ohhh, I trusted his promise, his voice, his hug,
Though in his eyes, I saw pain on his face.
He said, “A solution will come soon,
mmm, just rest, my child, and you will survive.”

I asked the doctor to tell me the truth,
He sat beside me, gentle yet smooth.
“Your heart’s too weak, it won’t carry on,
The end is near; it’s time to be strong.”

I spoke to my family, smiled through the tears,
I told them, “It’s okay, don’t live in fear.
If it’s my time, don’t be afraid,
My love for you all will never fade.”

Ohhh, But my father insisted, “It’s not the end,
A donor will come, your heart will mend.
Just rest, my child, don’t think anymore,
Trust me, soon this will all be no more.”

One day the news came like a fleeting light,
A new heart was ready, everything set right.
It all happened so fast, I couldn’t prepare,
They got me ready, but I was so scared.

“Rest now, my girl, everything will be fine,
A special gift will soon be yours, divine.”

Two long days later, I opened my eyes,
Felt a new beat in my chest, strong and alive.
I saw all their faces, smiling with glee,
But my father wasn’t there with me.

I asked for him, and mom began to cry,
She handed me a letter with trembling sighs.
With shaky hands, I opened it slow,
His words filled my heart like a radiant glow:

Ohhh, “The gift I promised now beats inside you,
My heart is yours, to live life true.
Dream big, my child, and chase the sky,
My love will guide you; it’ll never die.”

I touched my chest with tears and a smile,
Felt his heartbeat, strong all the while.
Now I know his ultimate sacrifice,
My father’s eternal gift, his precious life.

Ummmm Ummmm..

title: Kotek Panduś (słowa: Zenon Greinert)
lyrics:
Nasz Panduś ma czarne futerko
I pod bródką biały żabocik 
Lubi czasem spać pod kołderką
I czasem też trochę popsoci. 

Niewinnymi patrzy oczkami
Z których rozbłyska ciemna zieleń 
Głaskasz go i czujesz aksamit 
Życie z nim przebiega weselej.

Ma skarpetki na tylnych łapkach
Które są z dołu bardzo białe
Zbędna jest na myszy pułapka
Szybkość i bieg ma doskonałe.

Na ptaszęta lubi polować
I też na niektóre owady
Rozumiemy się z nim bez słowa
Mruczy jakby dawał nam rady. 
--------------------------------------------
© Zenon Greinert (2024)

title: Estoy perdido (Ballad Pop)
lyrics:
[English Lyrics Below]

[Language: Spanish]

[Instrumental Intro]


[Verse 1]
Las palabras parecen que no quieren salir
cansado, no veo a donde quiero ir
Los días pasan, las noches me tragan en la nada
y busco respuestas donde sé que no puedo hallarlas

Su mirada me enloquece a cada momento
la veo y la siento como humo entre espejos
Es esta sensación la que no me deja respirar
lo que digo sin sentido y no puedo callar


[Chorus]
Estooooy perdido (I'm lost)
en un camino de destino indefinido
Estooooy perdido (I'm lost) (lost)
y el destino juega conmigo

[Post-Chorus]
Una sensanción que no me deja volver
al sitio donde pertenecí una vez

(Ohhhh) (Ohhhhh) ¡AGHHHHHHHH!

[Instrumental Solo]

[Verse 2]
Cada noche me la trae de vuelta a mi cabeza
mientras mi alma no descansa y solo vuela
La alegría se me escapa entre mis dedos
es arena, humo, entre miles de lamentos

Cada noche, me arrastra de manera especial
a recuerdos que yo creía haber enterrado ya
Cada noche, como ahora, no dejo de pensar
en esos ojos, esos labios que besan a alguien más

[Chorus]
Estooooy perdido (I'm lost)
en un camino de destino indefinido
Estooooy perdido (I'm lost) (lost)
y el destino juega conmigo

[Post-Chorus]
Una sensanción que no me deja volver
al sitio donde pertenecí una vez

[Break Solo]

[Bridge]
Es ahora el momento de decidir
si quedarse atrapado o seguir
Es el ahora lo que me mantiene anclado
y el futuro arrastra cadenas de mi pasado

[Final Chorus]
Estooooy perdido (I'm lost)
en un camino de destino indefinido
Estooooy perdido (I'm lost) (lost)
y el destino juega conmigo

[Post-Chorus]
Una sensanción que no me deja volver
al sitio donde pertenecí una vez



[Outro]
Estooooy perdido (I'm lost)
(Ohhhh) (Ohhhhh) ¡AGHHHHHHHH!
Estooooy perdido (I'm lost)
.
.

[Potent drummer preparing for a grand finale]
Estoy.... perdido
[final flourish]


----------------------

[ENGLISH LYRICS]

[Language: Spanish]

[Instrumental Intro]

[Verse 1]
The words seem like they don't want to come out
Tired, I don't see where I want to go
Days go by, nights swallow me in nothingness
And I look for answers where I know I can't find them

Her gaze drives me crazy every moment
I see her and I feel her like smoke between mirrors
It's this feeling that doesn't let me breathe
What I say without sense and I can't keep quiet

[Chorus]
I'm lost (I'm lost)
On a path of undefined destiny
I'm lost (I'm lost) (lost)
And destiny plays with me

[Post-Chorus]
A feeling that doesn't let me return
To the place where I once belonged

(Ohhhh) (Ohhhhh) AGHHHHHHHH!

[Instrumental Solo]

[Verse 2]
Every night brings her back to my head
while my soul doesn't rest and just flies
Joy slips through my fingers
it's sand, smoke, among thousands of laments

Every night, it drags me in a special way
to memories that I thought I had already buried
Every night, like now, I can't stop thinking
about those eyes, those lips that kiss someone else

[Chorus]
I'm lost (I'm lost)
on a path of indefinite destiny
I'm lost (I'm lost) (lost)
and destiny plays with me

[Post-Chorus]
A feeling that doesn't let me return
to the place where I once belonged

[Break Solo]

[Bridge]
Now is the time to decide
whether to stay trapped or continue
It's the now that keeps me anchored
and the future drags chains from my past

[Final Chorus]
I'm lost (I'm lost) lost)
on a path of indefinite destiny
I'm lost (I'm lost) (lost)
and fate plays with me

[Post-Chorus]
A feeling that doesn't let me go back
to the place where I once belonged

[Outro]
I'm lost (I'm lost)
(Ohhhh) (Ohhhhh) AGHHHHHHHH!
I'm lost (I'm lost)
.
.

[Powerful drummer preparing for a grand finale]
I'm.... lost
[final flourish]

title: Please just listen
lyrics:
humm  humm

Please, don’t shatter what’s left of me,
I’ve seen enough, I just want to be free.
You say I’m hard to understand,
but you’re the mystery I can’t comprehend.

I defended your name when no one would,
gave you my faith, my soul, my truth.
Don’t make me doubt what I believed,
don’t prove that I deceived myself too.

Please, Just Listen, Please,
don’t turn my love into regret.
Please, Just Listen, Please,
don’t fill this night with tears I’ll never forget.
I beg you, don’t let it be true,
that you’re the shadow I always knew.

I saw you shine when no one else could,
I believed in your light, even when it hurt.
Now I wonder if it was always a lie,
or was it me trying to see you fly?

I’ve faced your demons in silence before,
but now the weight feels like so much more.
Don’t prove my faith was misplaced,
don’t destroy what I fought to embrace.

Please, Just Listen, Please,
don’t turn my love into regret.
Please, Just Listen, Please,
don’t fill this night with tears I’ll never forget.
I beg you, don’t let it be true,
that you’re the shadow I always knew.

If you want to lose yourself in chaos and rage,
don’t do it here, where I hold my last stage.
If the world’s too heavy and you need to scream,
do it far away, don’t break my dream.

Please, Just Listen, Please,
don’t turn my love into regret.
Please, Just Listen, Please,
leave me with something more than this pain I’ve met.
I beg you, don’t extinguish my flame,
in your shadow, I can’t find my name.

Please, Just Listen, Please,
don’t destroy what’s left of my love.

title: Closer to Forever
lyrics:
I feel your touch, it lingers on my skin,
A quiet warmth, where love begins.
Every moment, you're all I see,
A world of us, where I’m meant to be.

And when you hold me, time stands still,
A love so strong, it bends my will.

Take me closer to forever,
Where our hearts can beat together.
In your arms, I’ve found my place,
A love that time cannot erase.

Your voice, it carries through the air,
A melody beyond compare.
Every word, a gentle embrace,
A promise written on my face.

And when you hold me, time stands still,
A love so strong, it bends my will.

Take me closer to forever,
Where our hearts can beat together.
In your arms, I’ve found my place,
A love that time cannot erase.

Your voice, it carries through the air,
A melody beyond compare.
In your arms, I’ve found my place,
A love that time cannot erase.

No distance, no fear, can tear us apart,
You’re the rhythm that beats in my heart.
Through every storm, through every tide,
I’ll stay with you, right by your side.

Take me closer to forever,
Where our hearts can beat together.
In your arms, I’ve found my place,
A love that time cannot erase.

Closer to forever,
With you, my love, forever.

title: Bring a Ring (Reba mix)
lyrics:
[Verse]
The boys all stand in line and flood into the courtyard
Ringing on my doorbell and bringing me their good hearts
They ask me to dance so I spin 'em out to the yard
But none of them are husband material so far

[Verse 2]
I rejected one and slapped him in the face
Apologized but told him he must make haste
Go back home because his time has come
I said and bring a ring if you want some son

[PreChorus]
I told him

[Chorus]
Have I made the mistake? I don't feel the same
How much I was ashamed of claiming what ain't mine
And crying are you blind? There's good loving outside
So don't waste your best years trying to

[Verse 3]
Do you remember how I begged your pardon?
When I don't know where your hand's been
And that dumbass grin
And you locked me in
Uh oh watch it begin

[Verse 4]
Oh babe you really gotta leave my apartment?
I know we should be apart then
I don't know what I'm doing
But I'm tired of ruining
The only mind I trust for my story

title: Impossible Loves
lyrics:
In the tales of this world  
They teach about love  
With star-crossed destinies  
That fought  
And prevailed  
Conquering all pain  
Bonds so unbreakable  
They face every tragedy  
True loves  
Inspiring dreams  

Through every storm, they shine  
Their hearts forever aligned  
Against the odds, they rise  
Their love never dies  

No force in the universe  
Nor message more perfect than love  
Than love  
Uniting two destinies  
Reaching the impossible  
Conquering all pain  
Letting go of fear  
Embracing every risk  
Diving with passion  
No deeper force exists  
It's the mystery beyond reason  

Love is the guiding light  
In the darkest night  
Love is the endless fight  
That always feels so right  

By your side in this tale  
Inspiring the world  
For tragedies and troubles  
Were neither strong  
Nor deep  
Enough to shake us  
In poetry’s pages  
And every melody  
Our impossible story  
The world will tell  

[Pre-Chorus]

Through every storm, they shine  
Their hearts forever aligned  
Against the odds, they rise  
Their love never dies  

No force in the universe  
Nor message more perfect than love  
Than love  
Uniting two destinies  
Reaching the impossible  
Conquering all pain  
Letting go of fear  
Embracing every risk  
Diving with passion  
No deeper force exists  
It's the mystery beyond reason  

Through fire and rain, we'll stand  
Hand in hand, we’ll withstand  
Every challenge, every trial  
Together we’ll walk each mile  

Love is the guiding light  
In the darkest night  
Love is the endless fight  
That always feels so right  

In every story told  
Our love will unfold  
A tale of hearts so bold  
A love that won't grow old  
Love, the ultimate art  
Binding every heart  
In a world where dreams start  
Love is the beating heart

In a world where dreams start  
Love is the beating heart

title: あなたへの愛はずっと変わらない
lyrics:
[Verse]
君の笑顔が太陽みたいに
俺の心を温めるんだ
どんな時も君のそばで
星のように輝きたいんだ

[Verse 2]
君と一緒の瞬間が
毎日を宝石に変えるんだ
雨が降っても風が吹いても
俺の愛は決して揺らがない

[Chorus]
あなたへの愛はずっと変わらない
どんな未来も共に行こう
手を握って一緒に歌おう
君だけが俺のすべて

[Bridge]
高い山も深い海も
越えて行ける気がするんだ
二人なら何も怖くない
夢の中でも君といたい

[Verse 3]
忘れられない思い出たち
一つ一つが宝物さ
新しい日々を塗り替えて
未来を一緒に描こう

[Chorus]
あなたへの愛はずっと変わらない
どんな未来も共に行こう
手を握って一緒に歌おう
君だけが俺のすべて

title: Setting Sun
lyrics:
[Verse]
I'll go down with the setting sun
Chasing shadows 'til I'm done
Through the twilight I will run
Till the moon and I are one

[Verse 2]
Stars above they paint the sky
Whisper secrets passing by
In their glow I say goodbye
As the night begins to fly

[Chorus]
Oh the day fades fast away
In the dusk we often stray
Let the darkness lead the way
Till the dawn brings back the day

[Verse 3]
Candle flickers in the night
Guiding me with gentle light
In the dreams where love takes flight
To the realms of pure delight

[Bridge]
Hold the secrets of the night
In your heart with all your might
When the morning stakes its claim
We'll return and start again

[Chorus]
Oh the day fades fast away
In the dusk we often stray
Let the darkness lead the way
Till the dawn brings back the day

title: Dile al Amor
lyrics:
----------------------
© Copyright 2024 - @AMIX
🎵 Original lyrics by AMIX🎵
--------------------------------------

Dile al amor, no toques mi puerta,  
Que ya no estoy en casa.

Dile a mi corazón, no abras la puerta,  
Ya no soy esa persona...

Me voy a un lugar lejano,  
Donde el amor ya no exista.  
Lejos de estas traiciones,  
Sin lágrimas, sin noches de llanto.

Dile al amor, no quiero invitados,  
No quiero heridas nuevas.

Mi corazón ya está cansado,  
No quiero dolor, no quiero llanto,  
Lo he cerrado con tres candados.

Dile al amor, no vuelvas a mí,  
No llames de puerta en puerta.

No quiero suerte, no quiero juegos,  
Este corazón no tiene suerte en el juego.

Dile al amor, no toques mi puerta,  
Que ya no estoy en casa.  
Dile a mi corazón, no abras la puerta,  
Ya no soy esa persona...

Me voy a un lugar lejano,  
Donde el amor ya no exista.  
Lejos de estas traiciones,  
Sin lágrimas, sin noches de llanto.

Dile al amor, no quiero invitados,  
No quiero heridas nuevas.

Mi corazón ya está cansado,  
No quiero dolor, no quiero llanto,  
Lo he cerrado con tres candados.

title: Більше не сумую за тобою,
lyrics:
[guitar_solo] 
[Куплет 1]
Більше не сумую за тобою,
Байдуже, що плачеш ти в пітьмі.
Все скінчилось, я живу собою,
І не прагну бути, як тоді.

[Приспів]
Знову кажеш, що кохаєш,
А тоді встромляєш ніж.
Біль минув, та шрами залишились,
Час не здатен їх сховать.
В самотині
Світла прагну,
Лікую серця рани,
Щоб знов навчитись мріяти.
[electric_guitar]1. [bass][drums] 
[Куплет 2]
Вже не бачу образу твого,
Хай життя руйнує – все дарма.
Я застиг, не відчуваю знову,
І любов твоя – важка тюрма.

[Приспів]
Знову кажеш, що кохаєш,
А тоді встромляєш ніж.
Біль минув, та шрами залишились,
Час не здатен їх сховать.
В самотині
Світла прагну,
Лікую серця рани,
Щоб знов навчитись мріяти.

title: Tere pyar me pagal💫⭐️
lyrics:
[Verse]
तेरी यादों में डूबा मैं हर शाम रहूं
तेरी बाहों के सपने ही मेरे ख्वाब बनूं
तेरे बिना अधूरा सा लगे हर पल
तेरी धड़कन में मिल जाए मेरी हलचल

[Chorus]
तेरे प्यार में पागल मैं तेरा दीवाना
दिल कहे फिर से बन जा तू मेरा अफसाना
चांदनी रातों में तुझसे बातें करूं
तुझसे मिले बिना मुझे सुकून न मिले गुरु

[Verse 2]
तेरे बिना हर सवेरा मुझे अधूरा लगे
तू भी जानें मेरे दिल का हिस्सा अब तू बने
हर तस्वीर में बस तेरा ही चेहरा देखूं
तेरे बिना दिन का उजाला भी क्यूं स्याह लगे

[Chorus]
तेरे प्यार में पागल मैं तेरा दीवाना
दिल कहे फिर से बन जा तू मेरा अफसाना
चांदनी रातों में तुझसे बातें करूं
तुझसे मिले बिना मुझे सुकून न मिले गुरु

[Bridge]
तेरा नाम मेरे होठों पे सज़ा है हर बार
तेरे बिना लगे ये दिल अब कैसे उधार
तेरी हंसी में बसी मेरी सारी खुशियां
तेरे पास आकर पाऊं मैं नई दुनियां

[Chorus]
तेरे प्यार में पागल मैं तेरा दीवाना
दिल कहे फिर से बन जा तू मेरा अफसाना
चांदनी रातों में तुझसे बातें करूं
तुझसे मिले बिना मुझे सुकून न मिले गुरु

lyrics:
[Verse]
The boys all stand in line and flood into the courtyard
Ringing on my doorbell and bringing me their good hearts
They ask me to dance so I spin 'em out to the yard
But none of them are husband material so far

[Verse 2]
I rejected one and slapped him in the face

I told him

[Chorus]
Have I made the mistake? I don't feel the same
How much I was ashamed of claiming what ain't mine

When I don't know where your hand's been

I don't know what I'm doing

title: next 50 years
lyrics:
The next 50 years will be a psychedelic carnival of chaos and awakening, a relentless rollercoaster ride hurtling humanity toward the final act of the grand cosmic shift. Picture this: the old guard, bloated with fear and stubborn as dinosaurs, crumbling into obsolescence while a new breed of thinkers, dreamers, and doers rise from the ashes like phoenixes armed with neural links and solar panels. It’s not just evolution, baby—it’s revolution on a multidimensional scale.

First, the old systems will stagger and fall, their greedy, creaky bones no match for the tidal wave of collective awakening. Political hierarchies, economies of scarcity, social frameworks built on fear—they’re toast. But don’t kid yourself; the fall won’t be smooth. There’ll be riots in the streets, polarizations sharper than a samurai’s blade, and enough resistance to make even the bravest futurist gulp.

Meanwhile, the freak flag of interconnectedness will be hoisted high. People will start feeling each other, literally and metaphorically. Telepathy, lucid dreams, astral projection—it’s not sci-fi anymore, it’s daily life. Reality itself will crack open like an egg, spilling multiverses onto the kitchen floor of human perception.

Nature, though, she’s the wildcard. The planet’s going to make it abundantly clear: adapt or perish. Disasters will force innovation at warp speed—solar farms blooming in deserts, cities floating on water, and AI systems that care more about trees than tweets.

And then there’s the heart of the matter: humanity’s internal alchemy. Forget the old myths of power and profit; the new currency is self-awareness. Meditation and mindfulness will go mainstream, the sacred merging with the scientific as people learn to ride the waves of their inner universes.

By the end of this half-century acid trip, humanity won’t be limping into the future—it’ll be strutting like Mick Jagger on a cosmic stage, powered by love, unity, and the undeniable realization that life, in all its chaotic glory, was always meant to be co-created. It won’t be perfect, but it’ll be one hell of a show.

(Verse 1)
Fifty years on a road unknown,
Where the old ways crumble, the seeds are sown.
Power shifts and hearts collide,
The universe opens, the truth won’t hide.

(Pre-Chorus)
From chaos rises a brighter spark,
A blazing fire in the endless dark.
Telepathic whispers, dreams that fly,
Multiverses bloom beneath the sky.

(Chorus)
We’re strutting into the future bold,
Breaking the chains of the stories old.
Love’s the rhythm, awareness the beat,
On the cosmic stage, we’ll find our feet.

(Verse 2)
The earth speaks loud, with storms she’ll roar,
Adapt or perish, she’ll settle the score.
Solar blooms and cities that float,
A world rebuilt on a higher note.

(Pre-Chorus)
From the ashes of greed, the phoenix sings,
A shift in the soul where the truth begins.
Meditation rising, minds align,
The sacred and science intertwine.

(Chorus)
We’re strutting into the future bold,
Breaking the chains of the stories old.
Love’s the rhythm, awareness the beat,
On the cosmic stage, we’ll find our feet.

(Bridge)
This ain’t perfection, it’s raw and wild,
The universe dancing, free as a child.
Through every disaster, a world takes shape,
It’s the power of life.

title: Searching For The Light
lyrics:
(Intro)

(Verse 1)
孤独な夜に　星が流れる
涙の中で　声が聞こえる
遠くの過去に　心が閉ざされ
明日が見えない　夢が壊れる

(Chorus)
I've felt the darkness, suffocating me
Lost in the shadows, can't break free
But I'll keep holding on, searching for the light
In the depths of despair, I'll find my fight

(Verse 2)
迷い込んだ道　迷路のように
抜け出せなくて　苦しみの中で
手を伸ばしても　届かない空
消えゆく希望が　影に飲まれる

(Chorus)
I've felt the darkness, suffocating me
Lost in the shadows, can't break free
But I'll keep holding on, searching for the light
In the depths of despair, I'll find my fight

(Bridge)
Though the pain may linger, and the night feels long
I'll rise from the ashes, find where I belong
With each breath I take, I'll reclaim my soul
In the silence of the night, I'll find my whole

(Chorus)
I've felt the darkness, suffocating me
Lost in the shadows, can't break free
But I'll keep holding on, searching for the light
In the depths of despair, I'll find my fight

(Outro)
Though the pain may linger, and the night feels long
I'll rise from the ashes, find where I belong
With each breath I take, I'll reclaim my soul
In the silence of the night, I'll find my whole

title: Червона Рута (Chervona Ruta)
lyrics:
[Instrumental intro]
[[ntro]]
Ти признайся мені, 
Звідки в тебе ті чари,
Я без тебе всі дні 
У полоні печалі.

Може, десь у лісах 
Ти чар-зілля шукала,
Сонце-руту знайшла 
І мене зчарувала?

[Chorus]
Червону руту 
Не шукай вечорами,
Ти у мене єдина, 
Тільки ти, повір.

Бо твоя врода —
 То є чиста вода,
То є бистра вода 
З синіх гір.

[Verse 2]
Бачу я тебе в снах, 
У дібровах зелених
По забутих стежках 
Ти приходиш до мене.

І не треба нести 
Мені квітку надії,
Бо давно уже ти 
Увійшла в мої мрії.

[Chorus]
Червону руту 
Не шукай вечорами,
Ти у мене єдина, 
Тільки ти, повір.

Бо твоя врода —
То є чиста вода,
То є бистра вода 
З синіх гір.

[Instrumental break]
[fadeout]

Тільки ти, повір.

Бо твоя врода —
То є чиста вода,
То є бистра вода 
З синіх гір.

[Instrumental break]
[fadeout]

[fadeout]

title: sevgilim
lyrics:
Bakışlarda Başlayan Hikaye"

Bir gün okul bahçesinde, bir an göz göze geldik,
O an anlamıştım, kalbim sende kilitlendik.
Sözler sustu, bakışlar konuştu gizlice,
Korkularımda kaybolurken baktım sessizce.

Ama öğrenmiştim, bir yerlerde başka biri,
Kalbini tutan o, bendense çok uzaktı seni.
Yine de pes etmedim, dost olduk önce,
Bir umut bekledim, belki döner yüzün bir gece.


Bakışlarda başladı bizim hikayemiz,
Zamanla büyüdü bu eşsiz sevgimiz.
Kader yollar çizdi, biz buluştuk sonunda,
Şimdi mutluluk var ellerin avucumda.

Zor zamanlar geçti, sabırla bekledim seni,
Gözlerimde hep bir umut, sevdim gizliden seni.
Mesajlar geldi gitti, dostluktu bizim adımız,
Ama yüreğimde hep bir aşk saklıydı yalnız.

Bir gün ansızın döndün, bana baktın öylece,
Dedim ki: “İşte şimdi, aşk başladı gerçeğince.”
Kalbin artık serbestti, tutacak bir el aradı,
Ve ben oradaydım, bu aşk kaderin yazgısıydı.


Bakışlarda başladı bizim hikayemiz,
Zamanla büyüdü bu eşsiz sevgimiz.
Kader yollar çizdi, biz buluştuk sonunda,
Şimdi mutluluk var ellerin avucumda.

Her sabah gözlerinle uyanmak bir mucize,
Yanında olmak, nefes almak bir hediye.
Gözlerin diyor bana, "Sen hep kal benimle,"
Şimdi sevdamız gerçek, unutulur mu böyle?


Karanlık gecelerde yıldız gibi parladın,
Kalbimin derinlerinde sonsuz bir iz bıraktın.
Her şey bir bakışla başladı, senle tamamlandı,
Bu aşk bir masal değil, gerçeğe dönüştü sonunda.


Bakışlarda başladı bizim hikayemiz,
Zamanla büyüdü bu eşsiz sevgimiz.
Kader yollar çizdi, biz buluştuk sonunda,
Şimdi mutluluk var ellerin avucumda.

title: Pujangga cinta (another version)
lyrics:
Verse 1:
Di dalam hati, terdapat puisi
Cinta yang tak terucap, tak terlihat
Aku menulisnya, dengan darah dan jiwa
Untukmu, cinta, yang tak terpisahkan

Chorus:
Oh, pujangga cinta, aku menyanyi
Dengan kata-kata, yang tak terhenti
Cinta ini, tak terucap, tak terlihat
Tapi terasa, dalam setiap detik

Verse 2:
Aku mencari kata, yang tepat
Untuk menggambarkan, cinta ini
Tapi tak ada, kata yang cukup
Untuk menerangkan, perasaan ini

Chorus:
Oh, pujangga cinta, aku menyanyi
Dengan kata-kata, yang tak terhenti
Cinta ini, tak terucap, tak terlihat
Tapi terasa, dalam setiap detik

Bridge:
Cinta ini, seperti puisi
Tak terucap, tak terlihat
Tapi terasa, dalam hati
Dan tak akan pernah, berakhir

Chorus:
Oh, pujangga cinta, aku menyanyi
Dengan kata-kata, yang tak terhenti
Cinta ini, tak terucap, tak terlihat
Tapi terasa, dalam setiap detik

title: power of responsibility (Remastered)
lyrics:
(Verse 1)
Listen up, grasp the plan,
Responsibility, in your own hand.
Wisdom dropping, paving the way,
Take charge, every single day.

(Chorus)
Responsibility, shapes our fate,
Own your choices, before it's too late.
Guidance leads, reality we see,
Power of responsibility, sets us free.

(Verse 2)
No more excuses, no more games to play,
Time to rise up, claim your say.
On you rests, the path to endorse,
Seize control, with determined force.

(Chorus)
Responsibility, shapes our fate,
Own your choices, before it's too late.
Guidance leads, reality we see,
Power of responsibility, sets us free.

yo

title: NIRVAN GHOCHU
lyrics:
"સમય સાથે તારી યાદો ધીમે ધીમે થોડી ધૂંધળી થઈ ગઈ,
પણ હ્રદયના એક ખૂણામાં આજે પણ તું જ વસી ગઈ.
કહેવા માટે તો તું એક ક્ષણની મુલાકાત હતી,
પણ એ ક્ષણ જ જીવનભર માટે યાદગાર બની ગઇ...!

title: The Art of Procrastination
lyrics:
[Verse]
I wake up in the morning, ready to seize the day
But then I see my phone and it's time to delay (delay, delay)
I click on Instagram, get lost in a rabbit hole
Hours pass by and I've achieved nothing at all (nothin' at all)

[Verse 2]
I say I'll clean my room and sort through that old drawer
But Netflix calls my name and I can't ignore (ignore, ignore)
I start a new series, just one episode or two
Before I know it, the day is through (the day is through)

[Chorus]
Procrastination, you're my constant companion
I'll get things done tomorrow, but right now I'm relaxin' (relaxin')
In the art of procrastination, I'm an expert, no lie
Just one more YouTube video, and then I'll say goodbye

(Outro)

But as the sun sets low, and the night begins to fall,
I realize it's time to break free, time to heed the call.
No more excuses, no more wasted time,
It's time to rise above, and let my potential shine.

So farewell to procrastination, it's time to take control,
To seize each moment, and make progress my goal.
With determination in my heart, and focus in my mind,
I'll conquer each challenge, leaving procrastination behind.

For in the journey of self-improvement, I'll find my true delight,
And in the light of productivity, my future will ignite.
So goodbye, procrastination, it's time to say goodbye,
I'm stepping into greatness, reaching for the sky.

title: High Rizz Man (Reba mix)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
He's got a yellow vase
Yellow t-shirt and pink and brown jeans
Living off cheap dates
Louder than life smiling knowingly

[Verse 2]
Making burgers in the morning
For his girlfriend noon and night
In the garden peeling oranges
Twirling his moustache

[Chorus]
He's a high rizz man
Awfully dependable slaying
The first syllable amazing
You might not realize
He could be your guy
He's a laugh and a half at least
High Rizz man
Awfully conventional pays
For the dog's breaking all
Aligning all critics when
He grapples with danger and wins
He's a laugh and a half

[Verse 3]
And the dog's called Max
Short for Maxine not short for maximus
He's a butcher by trade
A little meaty but that's his sexiness

[Verse 4]
Making little red balloons
For the kids at your college friend's
Birthday party saying "aloha"
And winking his third eye at ya

[Chorus]
He's a high rizz man
Awfully dependable slaying the first syllable
Amazing
You might not realize
He could be your guy
He's a laugh and a half at least
High Rizz man
Awfully conventional pays
For the dog's breaking all
Aligning all critics when
He grapples with danger and wins

[Spoken]
High Rizz Man

title: Morskie Oko (słowa: Zenon Greinert)
lyrics:
Wita mnie wody tafla przejrzysta
Deszcz sączy krople tuż nad Rysami,
Morskiego Oka przyjazną przystań
Ożywia wielkich szczytów dynamizm.

Schronisko drewnem kryte wiekowym
I Zamoyskiego pamięci płyta,
Oparów kłęby podnoszą głowy
Jakby o aurę chciały zapytać.

Zbocza wciąż chroni kosodrzewina
W żlebach puchowe białe poszycie,
Dziwne, że w skalnych ciasnawych klinach
Szarotki cieszą się pięknym życiem.

Głazy tulące brzegi jeziora
Tajemną magię unoszą wokół,
Nieśmiałe słońce w mglistych kolorach
Złoci strumienie w rwącym potoku.

Płuca wdychają górski aromat
Marsz ułatwiają tłumom turystów,
I nawet w miejscu gdzie ściana stroma
Znajdują przestrzeń wspinaczki czystą.
----------------------------------------
© Zenon Greinert (2024)
